welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wudalianchi, where the natural beauty of the volcanic landscape awaits you. Enjoy the healing hot springs, stunning crater lakes, and rich history as you explore this charming city.

restaurants.name: 吉祥 Restaurant
restaurants.description: 吉祥 Restaurant is a chinese restaurant located in Heihe.

restaurants.name: 老渔翁野生鱼手擀面
restaurants.description: 老渔翁野生鱼手擀面 is a chinese restaurant located in 五大连池市.
restaurants.address: 五大连池风景区 (镇上), 五大连池市, 黑龙江

restaurants.name: 大福鱼馆 (Dafu Yu Guan)
restaurants.description: 大福鱼馆 (Dafu Yu Guan) is a chinese restaurant located in Wudalianchizhen.

restaurants.name: Русские шашлыки
restaurants.description: Русские шашлыки is a wings joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Donkey Cart Tofu
restaurants.description: Donkey Cart Tofu is a chinese restaurant located in 黑河市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wudalianchi Dedu Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Wudalianchi Dedu Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
